nodes.text: The Tularan Skyway was a major thoroughfare on the planet Taris that passed through the industrial zone which surrounded one of Taris's primary power plants. The Skyway was destroyed in 3956 BBY when the Sith Lord Darth Malak bombarded the planet, and in the centuries afterward, the area became known as the Tularan Marsh. However, the Galactic Republic was unable to determine who or what the Skyway, and subsequently the Marsh, had been named after.
The Tularan Skyway was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Tularan Marsh in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
